title: Venezuelan president Maduro arrested on drug charges | 7NEWS
description: Venezuelan President NicolÃ¡s Maduro and his wife Celia Flores have been detained in a US facility following their arrest on drug trafficking and weapons charges. The arrest occurred after military operations including explosions in Caracas and a raid on the presidential palace, with the couple now awaiting a court appearance in Manhattan. title: Truck driver dies in fiery M7 crash | 7NEWS
description: A truck driver has died in a fiery crash on the M7 motorway in Cecil Hills, southwest of Sydney. Emergency services responded just after midnight to find the truck had hit a barrier, caught fire and rolled over. All southbound lanes between Elizabeth Drive and Campbelltown Road remain closed, with significant traffic disruptions continuing. title: Man found beaten and burned after 14-hour kidnapping | 7NEWS
description: A 29-year-old man was kidnapped from Military Road in Guildford, Western Sydney, and held captive for 14 hours before being found beaten, stabbed and burned in the boot of a Toyota Camry at Villawood. The victim was discovered by a member of the public who heard his screams and called emergency services. Police are investigating the violent attack, but the victim is not cooperating with authorities and no arrests have been made.
